StringProperty.Name: MergeSettingsFiles
StringProperty.Description: The type of merging to perform.

StringProperty.Name: LinkedSettingsFile
StringProperty.Description: The path to the linked settings file.

BooleanProperty.Name: WriteCache
BooleanProperty.Description: Indicates whether to cache analysis results.

Rule.Name: ExceptionOccurred
Rule.Context: An exception occurred while parsing the file: {0}, {1}.
